body_html:
@peterbraden what should the next steps be with this PR? Is this in a state where it should be merged into the TensorFlow repo? You mentioned wanting to attract collaborators; that doesn't seem to have happened so far.

We're trying to control the number of open pull requests so things are easier to manage, so if we don't have a story on merging this code we may close it due to inactivity.

body:
@peterbraden what should the next steps be with this PR? Is this in a state where it should be merged into the TensorFlow repo? You mentioned wanting to attract collaborators; that doesn't seem to have happened so far. 

We're trying to control the number of open pull requests so things are easier to manage, so if we don't have a story on merging this code we may close it due to inactivity.
